name: A Ride at Sunrise
description:
This is a game about going to school, meeting a peculiar stranger and existentialism of some sorts.

features:
- pretty short game, just 1 ending!

- one love interest, can be a boy or girl-- romance is optional of course!

- choose what to bring as your technical-breakfast-of-the-day from an egg sandwich to milk!!

- random dump for my thoughts abt the sea, my love and my confusion for everything all in one

- mc (that's you!) can have a customizable gender,  uniform and accessories to choose from

A word from the author:

Hi! I just wanted to make a game based around a town by the sea, and riding something to school. I wanted to let out some thoughts into this, both my sappy and head scratching (for me) thoughts. I hope everyone who plays this enjoys, It's made with H2O, Gasoline, Bread crumbs and tons of love from the bottom of my Hypothalamus!

p.s if you experience any errors, please leave it in the comments with a screenshot of the error. Thanks!

Twine Template by Vahnya!

Beta-read and tested by Soob!

Rest of the credits are at the end of the game!
